member.name: P:Atreemo.Areas.HelpPage.HelpPageSampleGenerator.SampleObjectFactories
member.summary: Gets factories for the objects that the supported formatters will serialize as samples. Processed in order, stopping when the factory successfully returns a non- object.
member.remarks: Collection includes just initially. Use SampleObjectFactories.Insert(0, func) to provide an override and SampleObjectFactories.Add(func) to provide a fallback.

member.name: T:Atreemo.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator
member.summary: This class will create an object of a given type and populate it with sample data.

member.name: M:Atreemo.Areas.HelpPage.ObjectGenerator.GenerateObject(System.Type)
member.summary: Generates an object for a given type. The type needs to be public, have a public default constructor and settable public properties/fields. Currently it supports the following types: Simple types: , , , , , etc. Complex types: POCO types. Nullables: . Arrays: arrays of simple types or complex types. Key value pairs: Tuples: , , etc Dictionaries: or anything deriving from . Collections: , , , , , or anything deriving from or . Queryables: , .
member.returns: An object of the given type.

member.summary: Indicates whether the sample is used for request or response

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Add your survey description. This is not customer facing, it is something that will help you identify the survey later.

member.name: M:Atreemo.Tools.GlobalHelper.IsProfileAccessAuthorised(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns true if the user is authorised to access the profile and false if not
member.param: Value to check depending on the authorization type (CtcID, CpyID, PrjMkgID , OpCode)
Authorization Type: 0--> Contact; 1 --> Company ; 2--> MarketingProject; 3--> Ecast; 4--> SMS

members.member:
Counting the result of a selection with the option to apply a node filter and to change the segmentation mode
Segmentation Mode /// SelectionNodes Nodecode of any node to be used as a filter (e.g. Emailable node) It returns the count of the selection with the applied filter

member.name: M:Atreemo.Tools.LoginHelper.DisablePageCaching
member.summary: Make sure the browser does not cache this page

member.name: M:Atreemo.Tools.LoginHelper.Send401(System.String)
member.summary:
Send a 401 response
For passing the returnUrl in order to force a refresh of the current page in case the cancel button in the Login popup has been clicked

member.name: P:ParserParser.HtmlTag.Name
member.summary: Name of this tag

member.name: P:ParserParser.HtmlTag.Attributes
member.summary: Collection of attribute names and values for this tag

member.name: P:ParserParser.HtmlTag.TrailingSlash
member.summary: True if this tag contained a trailing forward slash

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.Reset
member.summary: Resets the current position to the start of the current document

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.Reset(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the current document and resets the current position to the start of it

member.name: P:ParserParser.HtmlParser.EOF
member.summary: Indicates if the current position is at the end of the current document

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.ParseNext(System.String,ParserParser.HtmlTag@)
member.summary: Parses the next tag that matches the specified tag name
member.param: Name of the tags to parse ("*" = parse all tags)
Returns information on the next occurrence of the specified tag or null if none found
member.returns: True if a tag was parsed or false if the end of the document was reached

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.ParseTag(System.String,ParserParser.HtmlTag@)
member.summary:
Parses the contents of an HTML tag. The current position should be at the first character following the tag's opening less-than character.
Note: We parse to the end of the tag even if this tag was not requested by the caller. This ensures subsequent parsing takes place after this tag
member.param: Name of the tag the caller is requesting, or "*" if caller is requesting all tags
Returns information on this tag if it's one the caller is requesting
member.returns: True if data is being returned for a tag requested by the caller or false otherwise

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.ParseTagName
member.summary: Parses a tag name. The current position should be the first character of the name

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.ParseAttributeName
member.summary: Parses an attribute name. The current position should be the first character of the name

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.ParseAttributeValue
member.summary:
Parses an attribute value. The current position should be the first non-whitespace character following the equal sign.
Note: We terminate the name or value if we encounter a new line. This seems to be the best way of handling errors such as values missing closing quotes, etc.

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.MoveToNextTag
member.summary: Moves to the start of the next tag
member.returns: True if another tag was found, false otherwise

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.Peek
member.summary: Returns the character at the current position, or a null character if we're at the end of the document
member.returns: The character at the current position

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.Peek(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the character at the specified number of characters beyond the current position, or a null character if the specified position is at the end of the document
member.param: The number of characters beyond the current position
member.returns: The character at the specified position

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.Move
member.summary: Moves the current position ahead one character

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.Move(System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the current position ahead the specified number of characters
member.param: The number of characters to move ahead

member.name: M:ParserParser.HtmlParser.NormalizePosition
member.summary: Normalizes the current position. This is primarily for handling conditions where IndexOf(), etc. return negative values when the item being sought was not found

member.name: T:IPProcessStatus
member.summary: Summary description for IPProcessStatus

member.name: T:NameAndAddress
member.summary: Summary description for NameAndAddress
